entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 this evening then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023
